greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: "Say what you see".
comment: a(n) = 21322314 for n > 12; a(n) = A005151(n) for n > 6. - _Reinhard Zumkeller_, Jan 26 2014
maple: P:=proc(q,h) local a,b,c,k,n,x; x:=[h]; for n from 1 to q do
a:=convert(x[n],base,10); b:=0; for k from 0 to 9 do c:=numboccur(a,k);
if c>0 then b:=b*10^(ilog10(c*10+k)+1)+c*10+k; fi; od; x:=[op(x),b];
od; print(op(x)); end: P(25,3); # _Paolo P. Lava_, Aug 30 2018
program: f xs = (read $ concatMap show ys) : f (ys) where
ys = concat $ transpose [map length zss, map head zss]
results.author: _Parthasarathy Nambi_, May 09 2006
